Row.Text: [NEWLINE][TAB][TAB]"Distrust any enterprise that requires new clothes."[NEWLINE] - Henry David Thoreau[NEWLINE][TAB]

Incorporates Young Army, allowing all Civilizations to build franchises in their Cities. +5 [ICON_GOLD] Gold from every Young Army in the World.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Industrialization is also required.[ENDCOLOR]

{TXT_KEY_MISSION_CORP_CLOTHES}[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Clothing is fiber and textile material worn on the body. The wearing of clothing is mostly restricted to human beings and is a feature of nearly all human societies. The amount and type of clothing worn depends on physical, social and geographic considerations. Some clothing types can be gender-specific, although this does not apply to cross dressers. Physically, clothing serves many purposes: it can serve as protection from the elements, and can enhance safety during hazardous activities such as hiking and cooking. It protects the wearer from rough surfaces, rash-causing plants, insect bites, splinters, thorns and prickles by providing a barrier between the skin and the environment. Clothes can insulate against cold or hot conditions. Further, they can provide a hygienic barrier, keeping infectious and toxic materials away from the body. Clothing also provides protection from harmful UV radiation.
